text: The Man with Two Brains is a 1983 American science fiction black comedy movie directed by Carl Reiner and starring Steve Martin, Kathleen Turner, David Warner, Paul Benedict, George Furth, Peter Hobbs, Earl Boen. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1983 science fiction movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner
title: The Man with Two Brains
